phrases: Wars had ravaged the land for years.
The soil was soaked with blood.
The wailings of the bloody survivors could be heard throughout the land.
Let those who live to rebel take this as a warning.
But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
It is nothing compared to what he did for us.
Thanks to him, my son can run around again.
This world is not such a bad place with a man like him around.
You can move it with your shoulder muscles.
All you will need is a little practice.
I am so happy for you, dear.
You are really letting me have this for free?
I do this because I wish to.
Teach this man how to use his new limb.
Dr. Jukai is like Buddha himself.
Master gave me a reason to live when I was an orphan.
I am so happy to be able to work here.
He is been up all night?
We are almost at the doctor's place.
Is Dr. Jukai's home close by?
A passing samurai picked a fight with him and cut his arm off.
But I will do everything I can.
Oh doctor, thank you so much.
I am so relieved, did you hear that?
I could not thank you enough.
He will be running around again in no time.
I was afraid the doctor might be a scary man.
But I am ever so glad I came.
That you used to serve Lord Shiba?
A foreign ship picked me up after I would fallen into the sea.
I went with them to their country.
There, I learned how to make prosthetics for those who have lost their limbs.
I dare not say it is to atone for my sins.
But to just die peacefully as if nothing happened...
I did not think it could be forgiven.
I was supposed to have died, but was made to live.
It meant there was something I still had to do.
During the war with the Shiba clan...
Begging for your life after what you did?
I care not for my life.
Do whatever you wish when this job is over.
let me fulfill my promise to that child.
You could never atone for what you did.
You will never be my salvation.
Yes, it is a boy, my lord.
Seems like that crab took a liking to you.
Be careful, you will scratch your mask up.
Let us take some home for dinner.
Once again, I was made to live.
This boy is missing many body parts and does not seem to hear me.
But, he has a curious power.
There are things in this world more terrifying than a hundred demons.
But do not succumb to them, Hyakkimaru.
They must be drawn to his powers.
In order for you to survive on your own...
Sir Tahomaru, how strong you are!
Yeah, I am the strongest in this land!
Father, tell me about your last war.
He feels no pain, therefore he knows no fear.
He has no hesitation towards slashing and killing.
I only wished for one thing.
For him to overcome his destiny.
Have I made the wrong decision again?
You must have been rough on it.
Ghouls do not just eat people.
At times, they delude humans and lend them their powers.
They let a person benefit from their supernatural powers.
But in return, they take something away.
It may be that your body was taken from you in such an arrangement.
I would only be in your way.
I could not do anything for you.
All I did was teach you to kill.
You had this with you when I found you.
It may help you one day to find your real parents.
So if he goes around killing monsters, he will get his body back?
Yes, I suppose that is what it is.
Somebody must have made a deal with the demons a long time ago.
In return for that boy's body.
I do not know what they got, but his eyes, nose, mouth...
One must be prepared to go to hell to do such a thing.
What do these monsters want them for?
A single eye could not make their tummies full.
You have regained your sense of pain.
Stop it, you will get burnt!
Geez, what do you think you are doing?
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade... until night falls upon us
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
